keys:
Albrech Durer, 16. siècle, art de l'auto-portrait-portrait, la 
Renaissance
resource_data:

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f8-b584-42fa-2e87-8e19a50be997#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Albrech Dürer: Önarckép prémes köpenyben, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, München, 67,1x48,7 cm, olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en">Albrech Dürer:Self-portrait in furred cape, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, Munich, 67,1x48,7 cm, oil, canvas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrech Dürer:Self-portrait furred innen Kap, 
1500, Alte Pinakothek, München, 67,1x48,7 Zentimeter, Öl, Segeltuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrech Dürer:art de l'auto-portrait-portrait dans le cap 
poilu, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, Munich, 67,1x48,7 centimètre, 
huile, toile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrech Dürer:Self-portrait furred dentro o 
cape, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, Munich, 67,1x48,7 cm, óleo, lona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrech Dürer:Self-ritratto dentro furred il 
cape, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, Monaco di Baviera, 67,1x48,7 centimetro, 
olio, tela di canapa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δ5uρερ:Σελφ-πορτρέτο Albrech στο μαλλιαρό ακρωτήριο,
1500, Alte Pinakothek, Μόναχο, 67,1x48,7 εκατ., 
πετρέλαιο, καμβάς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrech Dürer:Self-portrait adentro furred el 
cabo, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, Munich, 67,1x48,7 centímetro, aceite, 
lona</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Fekete háttér előtt szembenéző mellkép, szakállas, hosszú hajú férfi</string>
            <string language="en">In front of a black background there is a facing half-length portrait, about a bearded, long-haired man</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Albrecht Dürer,  16. század,  önarckép,  reneszánsz,  </string>
            <string language="en">Albrech Durer, 16. century, self-portrait, renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vor einem schwarzen Hintergrund gibt es ein 
half-length Portrait der Einfassungen, über einen bärtigen, 
lang-behaarten Mann</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Devant un fond noir il y a une verticale en buste
de revêtements, au sujet d'un homme barbu et long-d'une chevelure</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na frente de um fundo preto há um retrato 
half-length dos revestimentos, sobre um homem bearded, 
longo-long-haired</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Davanti una priorità bassa nera ci è un 
ritratto half-length dei rivestimenti, circa un uomo barbuto e 
lungo-long-haired</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπροστά από ένα μαύρο υπόβαθρο υπάρχει ένα 
αντιμετωπίζοντας πορτρέτο μισό-μήκους, για ένα γενειοφόρο, 
μακρυμάλλες άτομο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Delante de un fondo negro hay un retrato 
half-length de los revestimientos, sobre un hombre barbudo, 
largo-long-haired</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrech Durer, 16. Jahrhundert, Selbstportrait, 
Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrech Durer, 16. siècle, art de l'auto-portrait-portrait, la 
Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrech Durer, 16. século, self-portrait, 
renascimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrech Durer, 16. secolo, self-ritratto, rinascita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Albrech Durer, 16, αιώνας, μόνος-πορτρέτο, 
αναγέννηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrech Durer, 16. siglo, self-portrait, renacimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
